name: 7-Day Mindful Mornings
description: Wake up 10 minutes earlier and follow a short mindfulness or breathing routine each morning.

name: 14-Day Gratitude Journal
description: Write three things you are grateful for every evening to build an attitude of gratitude.

name: 21-Day Walk Streak
description: Walk at least 20 minutes every day — get moving and clear your head.

name: 30-Day Water Boost
description: Drink 8 glasses of water each day to stay hydrated and feel better.

name: 14-Day No-Snooze
description: Get out of bed on first alarm — break the snooze habit and start your day strong.

name: 30-Day Read Daily
description: Read at least 20 minutes every day to build knowledge and focus.

name: 14-Day Evening Screen-Free
description: Avoid screens for 1 hour before bed to improve sleep quality.

name: 21-Day Push-Up Builder
description: Do a short push-up set each day, gradually increasing reps to build upper-body strength.

name: 30-Day Plank Challenge
description: Hold a plank daily and increase duration over 30 days to build core strength.

name: 14-Day Sugar Cut
description: Avoid added sugars and sugary drinks for two weeks to reset cravings.

name: 7-Day Daily Stretch
description: Spend 10 minutes stretching each day to improve mobility and reduce stiffness.

name: 30-Day Language Sprint
description: Practice a new language for 15 minutes each day to build fluency.

name: 10-Day Sleep Routine
description: Follow a consistent wind-down routine each night to improve sleep quality.

name: 21-Day Declutter
description: Spend 10 minutes a day decluttering a small area — finish the month with a tidier space.

name: 14-Day No Alcohol
description: Take a two-week break from alcohol to reset your habits and energy.

name: 30-Day Coding Streak
description: Code for at least 20 minutes every day to build consistency and momentum.

name: 14-Day Cold Shower
description: Finish your shower with 30–60 seconds of cold water to boost alertness and resilience.

name: 7-Day Flossing
description: Floss every day for a week to build a lasting oral hygiene habit.

name: 30-Day 10k Steps
description: Aim for 10,000 steps per day for 30 days to build endurance and daily activity.

name: 14-Day Digital Declutter
description: Unsubscribe, organize, and delete files/emails for 15 minutes daily to declutter your digital life.
